snippet.title: Peripheral Neuropathy In Persons with Cancer
snippet.description: * Peripheral Neuropathy In Persons with Cancer Remove throw rugs. Clear walkways of clutter, toys, footstools. Wear sturdy shoes . Avoid slippers and running shoes with thick soles. Wipe up spills right away.
